caption.title: Examples of proteins encoded in the same gene and functionally interacting

th.bold: Summary of functional relationship with the annotated protein

tr.td: Cyclin-dependent kinase inhibitor 2A or p16-INK4 (P42771), and p19ARF (Q8N726)
the unitary inheritance of p16INK4a and p19ARF may underlie their dual requirement in cell cycle control.
Guanine nucleotide-binding protein G(s) subunit alpha isoforms XLαs (Q5JWF2) and Alex (P84996)
Both subunits transduce receptor signals into stimulation of adenylyl cyclase.
A2AR stimulation increases the level of the uORF5 protein via post-transcriptional regulation.
Inhibits non-G protein-coupled signalling of angiotensin II, without altering the classical G protein-coupled pathway activated by the ligand.

fn.p: *The UniProtKB accession is indicated when available.
